Rulings.HAT:
● If this card is not in the GY before this effect activates, it does not activate.
EG: This card is discarded to activate "Mermail Abysspike", and "D.D. Crow" is chained. This card does not activate.
Rulings.Vegas:
● If this card is not in the GY before this effect activates, it does not activate.
EG: This card is discarded to activate "Mermail Abysspike", and "D.D. Crow" is chained. This card does not activate.
Rulings.Meadowlands: ● Even if this card isn't in the GY, its effect still activates (this is a format specific ruling). ● This effect can activate in the hand (even if you discard and re-add it with Abyssturge).
Rulings.FireWater:
● If this card is not in the GY before this effect activates, it does not activate.
EG: This card is discarded to activate "Mermail Abysspike", and "D.D. Crow" is chained. This card does not activate.

Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] If the activation of the WATER monster's effect that sent "Atlantean Marksman" to the GY is negated, the effect of "Atlantean Marksman" will still activate. The ultimate fate of the WATER monster's effect is irrelevant.

PSCT.Vegas:
① If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: 
You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Atlantean" Sea Serpent from your Deck (except "Atlantean Marksman"). 
② If this card is sent to the GY to pay the cost of a WATER monster's effect: 
Target 1 Set card your opponent controls; destroy that target.
PSCT.Meadowlands:
① If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: 
You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Atlantean" Sea Serpent from your Deck (except "Atlantean Marksman"). 
② If this card is sent to the GY to pay the cost of a WATER monster's effect: 
Target 1 Set card your opponent controls; destroy that target.
